start.text: Greetings and salutations =name=! You'll have to excuse the loud music that I'm playing. I just can't help myself!
start.choice: I noticed sounds coming from this general direction. I've never heard such sounds before! Where is it coming from?
At the moment, I'd like to listen to the music provided by this land. Live and drink.

node.text: My name is Cruxius, pleased to meet you!I

I have a strange device that will allow you browse and play many different songs from different realms.
While the sounds of Qud are magical, this offers any kind of music that your heart desires!
node.choice: Is there any way I can listen to music like this as I explore Qud?

node.text: Why yes! Just check my wares and you can have it for free!
